column3: utACK 6b816dc56b73025ca8fcb8b2a1e1dab8d18b4fd0. I am surprised there were no more bug report about that.
@kallewoof I would go with temptation and move the `GetTime() >= nNow` check to line 1554 as it is vaguely related to ShowProgress, this could help with readability too.
@mchrostowski Did you mean [1545](https://github.com/kallewoof/bitcoin/blob/6b816dc56b73025ca8fcb8b2a1e1dab8d18b4fd0/src/wallet/wallet.cpp#L1545) by any chance?
Concept ACK\n@kallewoof Agree with the move to the top of the block.
This PR is now a MOVEONLY. 4 lines moved up to L1547-1550 from L1560-1563.
